name: Cycling Manager Online Handheld
description:
Create your team and hire the best racers for the Stage.

Decide the Race Strategy and Follow your team.

Win Prizes & Earn Coins  to improve your team.

Compete Against other players in Rankings.

This game is a casual Cycling Manager focused on race strategy that can be played in short races of less than 5 minutes.

It's free, mobile-friendly and does not require any register or installation.
